I am looking for the "Report this seller" as we speak.

  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: April Abercrombie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:09 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auctio=
n for sorta Frank's Box?






  Yes...I know.... but it is fun to fantasiz=
e. Plus, if I am in a position to make a difference I will. The problem is =
knowing when or where that position is.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: Kristin Morris 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursd=
ay, May 21, 2009 7:56 AM
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for so=
rta Frank's Box?



    We can't police the entire internet.  People should=
 take responsibility for themselves and do some research and find out how t=
his works before they purchase.  

    Caveat emptor..  



---------------=
-------------------------------------------------------------

    From: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April A=
bercrombie
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:45 AM
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?=








    Exactly! That's what I'm sayin'.


    Wouldn't it be a hoot if=
 Frank himself blasted the guy. But that isn't the mature way..... ;)


   =
   ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: threadsintyme@... 

    =
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 5:52 AM
=

      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?


   =
   Why don't some of us respond to his ad...and take serious issue with thi=
s business of his lying to the public about Frank? 

      That info is a s=
erious breach of eBay policy. He could be banned from eBay for life. 
     =
 Al
      ---------- Original Message ----------
      From: "Kristin Morri=
s" <ckmorris95@...>
      To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
      Sub=
ject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
      Date: Thu=
, 21 May 2009 06:16:27 -0500

      WOW.. Frank.  I didn't realize you were=
 charging - and "thousands of dollars" to boot!  Must be to pay for that Fa=
raday Cage and the white noise generator thing this yahoo believes are in a=
ll your creations.  And hurry because "his supplier" (cough - cough Radio S=
hack) is discontinuing!  But no worries he has "sold over 2 dozen of these =
'Frank's Boxes devices" so he must be legit because he knows - and actual c=
ustomer bought a 'real' Frank's Box and said it was equal!  Awesome.

     =
 k


----------------------------------------------------------------------=
----

      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] =
On Behalf Of ourobouros2k2
      Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 12:50 AM
    =
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for=
 sorta Frank's Box?







      Been following this unprofessional idiot's=
 items for awhile now. I love how he says that Frank charges thousands of d=
ollars for an original Frank's box. 

      This dude is the worst type of =
con, preying on people who know only enough to be familiar with the term Fr=
ank's box. Then again, it always has bothered me when people take shack hac=
ks and charge stupid prices for them on ebay under the Frank's box moniker.=


      This guy is based out of Nevada I believe, and his group's ethics l=
eave little to be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

      Andy

      =
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...> wrote:
      >
     =
 > Hmmm... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to read all the text to h=
ear
      > how he describes what he's selling. 
      > 
      > Do any of=
 you on this list know who he is? I just thought this was kind of
      > i=
nteresting... see:
      > 
      > http://tinyurl.com/o5pper
      > 
    =
  > Cheers,
      > 
      > Leslie, consistent lurker and occasional poste=
r <g>

      > "I'm not happy, I'm cheerful. There's a difference. =
A happy woman has no
      > cares at all. A cheerful woman has cares but h=
as learned how to deal with them."
      > 
      > -- Beverly Sills (1929-=
) American Opera Singer
